scripts.build: spago build && npm run adoc && echo Ctrl-f5 your browser if non-purescript changes were made!
scripts.adocw: watchexec -w blog/ -e adoc,pikchr npm run adoc
scripts.serve: npm run build && parcel serve index.html blog/*.html
scripts.release: rm -rf docs && npm run build && parcel build --dist-dir docs/ './index.html' './blog/*.html' && git checkout -- docs/CNAME
scripts.publish: npm run release && git checkout -- docs/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m publish
